packages.name: EMC Auditor (Custom DRC)
packages.description: Advanced EMC and signal integrity design rule checker with IEC60664-1 and IPC2221 compliance checking for professional PCB design.
packages.description_full: EMC Auditor is a sophisticated Design Rule Check (DRC) plugin for KiCAD that performs automated electromagnetic compatibility (EMC), signal integrity, and electrical safety checks. Features include: Via stitching analysis (ground plane connectivity), decoupling capacitor placement verification, ground plane continuity checking, EMI filter validation, clearance and creepage distance checking per IEC60664-1 (safety isolation), signal integrity framework with impedance control, trace width verification per IPC2221, and advanced pathfinding algorithms for spatial analysis. The plugin uses a modular architecture with TOML configuration, provides visual markers with grouping, progress dialogs, and comprehensive HTML reports. Perfect for professional PCB design, EMC compliance, safety certification, and high-speed signal routing.

packages.name: OpenFixture
packages.description: Automated laser-cuttable PCB test fixture generator. Creates manufacturing-ready DXF files for test fixtures with pogo pins, directly from your KiCAD PCB design.
packages.description_full: OpenFixture is a comprehensive PCB test fixture generator that integrates directly with KiCAD to automatically create laser-cuttable fixtures for your boards. The plugin analyzes your PCB design, identifies test points, and generates complete fixture designs including: laser-cut top/bottom plates, pogo pin placement, mounting hardware specifications, and 3D preview renders. Features include full KiCAD 9.0+ compatibility, TOML configuration system, multi-tab UI with material presets, support for both SMD and through-hole test points, and automatic OpenSCAD integration for DXF generation. Perfect for electronics manufacturing, rapid prototyping, and production testing.
